alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 11:11AM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River at New Ulm affecting Brown County. Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. Mississippi River AT Hwy 610 @ Brooklyn Pk affecting Hennepin and Anoka Counties. Mississippi River At Hwy 169 at Champlin affecting Hennepin and Anoka Counties. Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota and Wisconsin... Snake River At Mora affecting Kanabec County. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties. South Fork Crow River below Mayer affecting Carver County. Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Wright, Sherburne and Stearns Counties. Chippewa River at Eau Claire affecting Eau Claire County. Chippewa River at Durand affecting Buffalo, Pepin and Dunn Counties. .Flooding from the recent snowmelt will continue to flow through the weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Mississippi River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 AM CDT Thursday, the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 9.8 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 03/30/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
